original_text: But the man who had received one bag went off, dug a hole in the ground and hid his master’s money.
korean_text: 한 달란트 받은 자는 가서 땅을 파고 그 주인의 돈을 감추어 두었더니

sentences.original_text: But the man who had received one bag
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 한 봉지를 받았던 그 사람은

sentences.original_text: dug a hole in the ground
